summary: A comprehensive test suite for the array I/O utilities, exercising functions that read, write, and manipulate xarray DataArrays/Datasets with various coordinate types, dimensions, time handling (including cftime), lazy loading, chunking, and error conditions.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correctness of geospatial array input/output operations used in modeling workflows, ensuring proper handling of dimensions, time coordinates, and file formats.
